subject: Order #SSN3443
description_text: Dear Simsonn-team, today i recived the package with the haptic motors. In my order menu the pedals are still not shipped. When will the pedals be shipped? I am looking forward to my new pedals. I Look forward to your response. Order number #SSN3443 Sincerely Christian -- Gesendet mit der WEB.DE Mail App

conversations.body_text: Hi Christian Ruf,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have already reshipped your order. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047072609044
